document_data.name: Velandilmur
document_data.government: Administration on behalf of the kingdom
document_data.mainbody: '''Velandilmur''' was a port town of the kingdom of [[Gontal]].{{Cite dragon/366/Gontal|52}}
document_data.Government: As of [[1479 DR]], the Docklord Lantra Orhond administered the town on behalf of Queen [[Imreera Hethkantan]].
document_data.Background: Velandilmur was known for being a dangerous place for strangers. It was inhabited mostly by infirms, outcasts and outlaws.
